pos_mean_info_list.mean: 不舒适地；不自在地；令人不快地

word_group.brief_definition: 不舒服的姿势；困难立场；不安的境地
不舒适的体验；不愉快的经历

bilingual.source: If you see or read something that makes you feel uncomfortable, leave the site immediately.
bilingual.target: 如果你看到或读到让你感到不舒服的东西，立即离开该网站。

bilingual.source: Overeating can lead to an uncomfortable level of satiation.
bilingual.target: 暴饮暴食会导致不舒服的饱足感。

bilingual.source: She always keeps away from people who make her uncomfortable.
bilingual.target: 她总是避开那些让她不舒服的人。

bilingual.source: People often use euphemisms to avoid discussing uncomfortable topics.
bilingual.target: 人们经常使用委婉语来避免讨论不舒服的话题。

bilingual.source: You can block anyone who makes you uncomfortable at any time.
bilingual.target: 你可以随时拉黑那些让你不舒服的人。

bilingual.source: I know some students think uniforms are ugly and uncomfortable.
bilingual.target: 我知道一些学生认为校服是丑陋和不舒服的。

bilingual.source: Four hundred kms in that uncomfortable position was terrible for us.
bilingual.target: 在那个不舒服的位置行驶400公里对我们来说太可怕了。
可是女人们总是穿不舒服的鞋子。

bilingual.source: It's the most uncomfortable way to go to work.
bilingual.target: 那是最不舒服的上班方式了。

bilingual.source: Is there any trend you are uncomfortable trying?
bilingual.target: 有什么趋势是你试过之后觉得不舒服的吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Go shopping for clothes while Leonard and I sit in those uncomfortable chairs and hold your purses?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们去逛街，我和莱纳德就坐在店里不舒服的椅子上帮你们看着包包。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, Alex is your employee. If she's doing something that's making Leonard uncomfortable, you should talk to her.
yingyinNormal.zh: 艾利克斯是你的员工，如果她做出一些让莱纳德觉得不舒服的事，那你应该跟她谈谈。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, I'm sorry. Look, you and Joey, your both focusing on this uncomfortable thing, what you need to do is to change the subject.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，对不起，你们两个，满脑子都是这件令人不舒服的事，改变一下话题。

yingyinNormal.en: Nothing, I am also uncomfortable.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没什么，我也觉得很不自在。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay. Uncomfortable silence it is.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，那就诡异地沉默着吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, my. That's an uncomfortable topic.
yingyinNormal.zh: 天啊，这个话题够尴尬的。

yingyinNormal.en: It's uncomfortable. Maybe it will always be like that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这很不舒服。或许会永远如此。

yingyinNormal.en: Don't try to make me uncomfortable with feminine stuff.
yingyinNormal.zh: 别想用女人的东西来唬我。

yingyinNormal.en: Ask rhetorical questions that make people uncomfortable?
yingyinNormal.zh: 向别人吐嘈，让人家不舒服。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm sorry, how is this better than uncomfortable silence?
yingyinNormal.zh: 不好意思，这样还不如诡异地沉默呢？

yingyinNormal.en: I'm uncomfortable having been included in your lie to Penny.
yingyinNormal.zh: 卷入了你对潘妮的欺骗事件，我感到很不舒服。

yingyinNormal.en: Chrissy never mentioned she was uncomfortable with Mr. Gainsborough's comment.
yingyinNormal.zh: 克里斯从来没提起过，盖恩斯伯勒的言辞让她很不舒服。

yingyinNormal.en: Then what made you uncomfortable? Saying it in front of you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那是什么让你不舒服？在你面前说出来。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't know about you, but I'm very uncomfortable with all this. Why?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不知道你感觉如何，但这让我感到非常不舒服，为什么？

yingyinNormal.en: Sweetie, this conversation is starting to make me a little uncomfortable.
yingyinNormal.zh: 甜心，你们的对话让我觉得有点不舒服了。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, it's just that dogs make me a little uncomfortable. It hurts my teeth.
yingyinNormal.zh: 狗让我觉得很不舒服。我的牙齿冰得好痛。

yingyinNormal.en: And the last thing I want to do is to freak you out or make you feel uncomfortable.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我一点都不想吓到你，或是让你觉得不自在。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh good, you're here. Yeah, and I was worried that it was going to be uncomfortable.
yingyinNormal.zh: 很好，你在这里，我很担心这会是个不愉快的经验。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't understand what you're talking about and you're making me a little uncomfortable.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不明白你在说什么，不过你让我觉得有点不爽。

yingyinNormal.en: And I just need to tell you it makes me very uncomfortable and I just, you know, just stop it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你搞得我非常不自在，拜托，你别再亲了。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: It is deeply <highlight>uncomfortable</highlight> – it's the emotional equivalent of wearing a jacket weighted with stones.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这让人非常不舒服，这感觉就像穿着一件装了石头的夹克。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 形容词后缀, 一般缀于动词后, 表"可…的, 能…"

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: When confronted with an <highlight>uncomfortable</highlight> set of facts, the tendency is often to double down on their current position.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当面对一系列令人不安的事实时，人们往往倾向于加倍关注他们目前的立场。

sense_info_list.en: feeling slight pain or physical discomfort

examination_example.sentence: Massive rubbish dumps and sprawling landfills constitute one of the more <highlight>uncomfortable</highlight> impacts that humans have on wildlife.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大量的垃圾场和不断扩张的垃圾填埋场是人类对野生动物造成的最令人不安的影响之一。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: As you'll notice in the video, the mice definitely seem <highlight>uncomfortable</highlight> at the beginning of the experiment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 正如你在视频中注意到的那样，老鼠在实验开始时确实很不舒服。

examination_example.sentence: Another worker said the lack of protection at the store made her feel <highlight>uncomfortable</highlight> at work.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另一名工人说，商店里缺乏保护让她在工作中感到不舒服。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 形容词后缀, 一般缀于动词后, 表"可…的, 能…"

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 不舒适地；不自在地；令人不快地

word_family.mean: adj. 不舒服的；不安的；不自在的

examination_example.sentence: The seats were so <highlight>uncomfortable</highlight> that only a very heavy sleeper could manage to get any rest.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 座位太不舒服了，只有睡得很沉的人才能休息一下。

examination_example.sentence: Campers, in my eyes, were people who enjoyed insect bites, ill-cooked meals, and <highlight>uncomfortable</highlight> sleeping bags.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在我看来，露营者是会“享受”昆虫叮咬、饭菜难吃、睡袋不适的人。

examination_example.sentence: Silence may be viewed by some cultural groups as extremely <highlight>uncomfortable</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 沉默可能会被一些文化群体视为非常不舒服。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 令人不舒适的; 使人不舒服的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 不舒适地；不自在地；令人不快地

word_family.mean: adj. 不舒服的；不安的；不自在的

sense_info_list.zh: 令人不舒适的; 使人不舒服的

examination_example.sentence: Although Emily was <highlight>uncomfortable</highlight> to accept, she agreed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然爱米丽不愿意接受，但她还是同意了。

examination_example.sentence: I know some students think uniforms are ugly and <highlight>uncomfortable</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我知道一些学生认为校服是丑陋和不舒服的。
